title: Does anybody else LIKE the free icons for the old Honor system?
body:
I'm personally extremely happy with the icons (especially the mentor one <3).  This is probably going to be my icon for a really long time now.  I honestly hadn't expected a reward for my participation in the old honor system as it was really just about being a decent person.

Receiving these icons (that include mini versions of the ribbon they used to give) was really nice of them.  It's a little nostalgic to get to see the different ribbons I had (especially since back then, once you got a new one, it overwrote the previous one on your border).  Now I get to use my favorite one, the Mentor one all the time!

Anybody else like the icons?
